## OccurrenceConstraint type

Represents an occurrence constraint for Component Presentation(s) in a Region Schema.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type OccurrenceConstraint = ComponentPresentationConstraint & {
    MaxOccurs?: number;
    MinOccurs?: number;
};
```

**References:** [ComponentPresentationConstraint](./open-api-client.componentpresentationconstraint.md)
